channel.title: Drake on Welcome to my blog
channel.description: Recent content in Drake on Welcome to my blog

item.title: Drake: powerful tool for automatic reproducible workflow
item.description: Drake is a powerful tool for automatic reproducible workflow. Drake has great documentations online thus here I only show a simple example working with Rmarkdown. Rmarkdown file could be very slow to generate due to the calculations involved. And every small revise make you wait a long time if you re-render the file. When we use drake we can do all the calculations in advance thus the file rendering is super fast since we only need to re-calculate the revised object.
